short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the current time in different major cities around the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"World Clocks" is a user-friendly Chrome extension that allows you to quickly view the current time in approximately 100 of the world's major cities directly from your browser. Whether you're scheduling international meetings, keeping track of time zones of friends and family, or simply satisfying your curiosity, this tool is designed to provide accurate time with just a click.

Key Features:

Easy Access: View the current time in cities like Tokyo, New York, London, and many more, all from a simple popup.
Search Functionality: Quickly find the city you're interested in with the search feature, enhancing ease of use.
Stay Focused: The popup window remains active and in the foreground, allowing you to interact with other tasks without losing visibility.
Sleek Design: A minimalistic and clean interface ensures that the information is presented in a clear and concise manner.
"World Clocks" is perfect for professionals dealing with global teams, travelers, or anyone needing an instant check on the time across different time zones. Simple, effective, and free â€“ this extension is an essential tool for your browser.
